body:
- fix `BadParcelableException` && `NullPointerException(FragmentAnimator.getEnter())`  #1079 #1122 #1014 #1004
- Compatible with #1031 (v27.1.0+)  `Can not perform this action after onSaveInstanceState`
- Fix #1112, SwipeBackFragment does not completely `pop`
- Optimize DebugStackBubble

- fix #960 queue exceptions
- fix #949 #942 `extraTransaction().setCustomAnimations()` exitAnimation is not working

* Add `startDontHideSelf(fragment, launchMode)` - #882
* Fix #875, not callback `onEnterAnimationEnd()` when calling `extraTransaction().setCustomAnimations().start()`

* Optimize timing of `onFragmentResult()` callbacks. #866 
* Compatible with #863 (v27.1.0+)
* FragmentAnimator.setEnter/Exit/popEnter/popExit() will return to itself
* Fix #807, fix may mistakenly remove State-Fragment(no view) BUG
Fix `popTo()` animation display incorrect issue

* Added `startWithPopTo()`
* #791, improve the stability of `pop()`/`popTo()`
* #766, restore rootView's clickable status
* Fix #783, `onSupportVisible()` is not called sometime on nested Fragments(`FragmentStatePagerAdapter`): https://stackoverflow.com/questions/44052437/uservisiblehint-is-false-on-selected-viewpager-fragment-managed-by-fragmentstate

* Fix #778, fix `afterTransactionRunnable` is called before `popTo()`
* Fix #695, fix black background when closing SwipebackActivity with Animations or Transitions
* Fix #653, fix `startWithPop()` may cause unexpected issues

### Fix
* Fix```getHander.removeCallbacks(myRunnable);``` sometimes not working
* Fix #758, fix StackBubble may cause the NullPointerException

### Optimize:
* Replace the better `ViewDragHelper.java`
* Add `getViewDragHelper()` to `SwipeBackLayout.java`
* Add `STATE_FINISHED` to `OnSwipeListener'onDragScrolled(state)`

* Optimize the timing of onSupportVisible() & onSupportInvisible() calls for ParentFragment and ChildrenFragment.  #586 
* Optimize #733

Fix #717, fixed RootFragment startWithPop() not working;
PR #721 #723
Fix #714 (Fragmentation_SwipeBack BUG)
* Added ActionQueue mechanism, this will improve stability. ([ChangeLog](https://github.com/YoKeyword/Fragmentation/wiki))
Fix #677, compatible with ButterKnife's `Unbinder.unbind()`
#653 v1.1.9 is compatible with v4-27.0.0+
Fix #624

**Fragmentation:** Fix #607 , Fragment has not been attached yet
**Fragmentation-SwipeBack:** Add setEdgeLevel(MIN/MED/MAX/widthPixel)
Fix #551 , fix the fragment loaded by `loadRootFragment()` will be callback twice.

* Fix #548, optimize the exitAnimation of the childFragment loaded by loadMultipleRootFragment() when the parentFragment pop()
* Fix #550 , onFragmentResult() is not being called after startForResultDontHideSelf()
Fix #541, fix no animation BUG When calling loadRootFragment(id, fragment, true, true)
Fix visible lifecycle
Fix the targetFragment's animation incorrectly when the rootFragment.startWithPop(targetFragment)

* Optimize the callback timing of `onSupportVisible()`, `onSupportInvisible`. #475 #478
* Fix #483，SwipeBackLayout

* Add `setCustomAnimations()`、`startDontHideSelf()` to `ExtraTransaction.class`
* Fix #473
Fix #455

* Fix #445, SwipeBackLayout
* Optimize animation
Fix #415 , fix the click issue
Fix #416, onSupportVisible() may be called twice when the parent fragment first lazy load

Fix #409 
Add proguard-rules
